Thanks to @RepJayapal and the advocates for their invaluable contributions and support in helping to pass the Dream Act out of the @HouseJudiciary Committee!
The @HouseJudiciary passage of these #DreamAndPromiseAct provisions is a big win for America, and I am excited to keep working to make the #DreamAndPromise Act law without delay. #ProtectTheDream

The #DreamAndPromiseAct will enable #Dreamers, #TPS recipients, and #DED beneficiaries to stay in America – the only home they know – and let them help build a brighter future for our nation. #ProtectTheDream

I have seen the talents and strong work ethic #Dreamers bring to our economy.  I have seen them strengthen our communities and our culture.  And I know that our #TPS and #DED recipients share those same traits. #ProtectTheDream

As a co-author of the original #DreamAct, and as representative of the congressional district with America’s largest #Dreamer population, I know that our #Dreamers love America and call it their home. #ProtectTheDream

I’m fighting in Congress to restore the #VotingRightsAct, stamp out #VoterDiscrimination wherever it appears, and guarantee the #RightToVote for every eligible American citizen, no matter who you are, what you believe, or where you live.

The #19thAmendment was a huge step forward in our fight to expand #VotingRights, but it didn’t guarantee full and easy access to the ballot box for all Americans.  We've made more progress since then, but we still have a long way to go to protect the #RightToVote.

100 years ago today, the U.S. House of Representatives approved the #19thAmendment to grant women the #RightToVote. Today, like the #suffragists, I’m wearing white and have a yellow rose on my lapel to celebrate this anniversary. #WomensVote100 pic.twitter.com/XNy4bAtSkU

The American people know the truth: Trump's #FamilySeparation policy is deeply, deeply immoral. It has caused chaos and irreparable harm to countless families, and the damage is continuing to this day. We must keep fighting #UntilEveryFamilyIsReunited.

In the past year, I've visited immigration facilities like this CBP processing center in McAllen, Texas. Anyone defending Trump’s cruel #FamilySeparation policy should see the horrors we saw here: separated children behind chain-link fencing, unprotected by their loving parents. pic.twitter.com/KGUI8xaoxj

Jeff Sessions announced Trump's #FamilySeparation policy a year ago today. The policy's results? Children torn from their parents. Mothers and fathers with no idea where their children are. Boys and girls traumatized forever. Families who, in some cases, may never be reunited.
I wish a peaceful #Ramadan to Muslim families across America and around the world.  May this holy month be a blessed time of joy and reflection for all who celebrate.  #RamadanMubarak!
